member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER
member.summary: Describes a buffer memory access barrier. Used by buffer barriers to indicate when resource memory must be made visible for a specific access type.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.SyncBefore
member.summary: Synchronization scope of all preceding GPU work that must be completed before executing the barrier.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.SyncAfter
member.summary: Synchronization scope of all subsequent GPU work that must wait until the barrier execution is finished.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.AccessBefore
member.summary: Access bits corresponding with resource usage since the preceding barrier, or the start of ExecuteCommandLists scope.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.AccessAfter
member.summary: Access bits corresponding with resource usage after the barrier completes.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.pResource
member.summary: Pointer to the buffer resource being using the barrier.

member.name: D3D12_BUFFER_BARRIER.Size
member.summary: Must be either UINT64_MAX or the size of the buffer in bytes.
